charges.charge_description: 8:1326A.F REENTRY OF DEPORTED ALIENS-Defendant, an alien who had previously been arrested and deported from the US entered and was found in the US without consent to reapply for admission (1)

charges.charge_disposition: It is ordered that the defendant be remanded to the custody of the Federal Bureau of Prisons for a term of Thirty (30) months, and immediately upon release to serve a term of Three (3) years on Supervised Release. It is also ordered that the defendant shall pay a Special Assessment of $100.00; payable immediately. (1)

charges.charge_description: On or about Juanuary 18, 1999 in Ector County, in the Western District of Texas, defendant, an alien who had previously been arrested and deported, did illegally re-enter the United States in violation of Title 8, U.S.C., Section 1326(b). [7:99-m-25]
